name: Brikshya Map
author: Brikshya Technologies

sections.description: User can directly download the plugin form https://wordpress.org/plugins/brikshya-map . Please kindly refer google for installing the plugin if has less idea.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Settings->Plugin Name screen to configure the plugin
  4. (Make your instructions match the desired user flow for activating and installing your plugin. Include any steps that might be needed for explanatory purposes)
sections.faq:
What Should I do first after installing the plugin?

After installing the Plugin user have to save the google map api key, until the key is saved the map will not properly, may cause errors.

How to add Marker?

User can add their won marker icon. That will be loaded while loading map on website. Multiple Markers can be added, however user can currently add markers or edit the name of the marker. The current version doesn’t support editing the marker icon or image once it is added.

How to add Map?

From Briskshya Map > Add New, users can add new map, the user can drag the first marker shown to make the default map address which will be shown when the map is loaded.

Can Multiple map be added on single page?

No, sorry the current version doesn’t support multiple map on a single page.

How to add map on page?

Users can add the map with the help of sortcode that will be displayed on the Brikshya Map Main Page
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • Initial release.

1.0.1

*Map Bug Fixed.

After installing the Plugin user have to save the google map api key, until the key is saved the map will not properly, may cause errors.

Adding Marker.
User can add their won marker icon. That will be loaded while loading map on website. Multiple Markers can be added however user can currently add markers or edit name of the marker. The current version dont support editing the marker icon or image once it is added.

Adding Map
Multiple Maps can be created, however user can’t add multiple map on a single page.

From Briskshya Map > Add New , users can add new map, user can drag the first maker shown to make the default map address which will be be shown when map is loaded.

User can drop multiple pins which will be shown below, that can be assigned to corresponding marker that the user added from Markers.

User can select map type from dropdown, zoom level.

User can add Polylines, in lat , logn lat, long . but user lat long in a set,

short_description: Using this plugin user can add google map with multiple custom markers , Polylines, GeoJSON files.
